import React from 'react'; import '../components/logo/_logo.scss'; import "../pages/Home.scss" const hamburgerToggler = document.querySelector(".hamburger") const navLinksContainer = document.querySelector(".navlinks-container"); const toggleNav = e => { hamburgerToggler.classList.toggle("open") navLinksContainer.classList.toggle("open") } hamburgerToggler.addEventListener("click", toggleNav) const Home = () => { return (
Groupomania Acceuil Connexion Inscritpion Profil

); }; export default Home;
